title: U.S debt ceiling: President Biden and Republicans strive for consensus amid partisan divisions
description: President Joe Biden, a Democrat, alongside key Republican representatives, is grappling with the precarious issue of raising the U.S. government’s formidable $31.4 trillion debt ceiling. Unless appropriate action is taken, the Treasury Department’s red flag warning of a potential default by June 5 has created a pressure cooker environment. Weeks of negotiations have seen the ... Read more
